block.p: ROLONTZ-Robert. 79. Died June 14, 2000 from complications after 22 years of Parkinson's Disease. Producer of Mickey and Sylvia's hit recording ''Love is Strange.'' Author of the book ''How to Get Your Song Recorded.'' Conceived the idea for the platinum record. Creator of the Ralph J. Gleason Music Book Award. Survived by wife/best friend, Susan; adored children, daughter Lee, son Morgan; sister Lela; loved grandchildren, Madeleine and Pauline. A memorial service will be held in mid July. Donations may be made to Michael J. Fox Foundation for Parkinson's Research, Chelsea Piers, Suite 303, Pier 62, NYC 10011.
